os.fullpath: Operating System :: Handheld/Embedded Operating Systems :: Android

name: Money Manager
short_description:
PaydayR's Money Manager app for android can be used to set budgets and track spending on android devices.

Money Manager can sort spending and budgets into groups or subgroups, create alert notifications when your about to reach a set budget threshold, auto-apply expenses from bank account or credit card text message notifications and forecast budgets with intuitive charts and graphs based on prior spending.

PaydayR's initiatives and resources for same day payday loans, peer-to-peer lending, and other short-term financing options help consumers to manage debt and achieve their financial independence. 

About PaydayR http://about.me/PaydayR

For more information on the open source Money Manager project and other projects from PaydayR, go to http://paydayr.com or connect with us on Google+ at https://plus.google.com/+Paydayr
